brand_identity.name: Nord Keyboards
brand_identity.description: Handmade in Sweden, Nord keyboards are famous for their award-winning stage pianos, synthesizers, and organs. Known for their distinctive red finish and premium build quality.

products.name: Nord Stage 4
products.description: The new generation flagship stage keyboard featuring Nord's latest Piano, Organ and Synth engines. Features a redesigned panel with dedicated LED faders for each layer, enabling unprecedented hands-on control. The Stage 4 combines the powerful sounds from the Nord Sample Library, Nord Piano Library, and advanced synthesis for the ultimate performance instrument.

products.name: Nord Piano 5
products.description: The Nord Piano 5 features dual piano engines, dual sample synths, and twice the memory of its predecessor for the ultimate piano experience. With 120-voice polyphony and the acclaimed Triple Sensor keybed, it delivers exceptional feel and response. Includes an extensive factory sound library and supports user samples from the Nord Piano Library and Nord Sample Library.

products.name: Nord Electro 6
products.description: The Nord Electro 6 series offers the classic soul of vintage electromechanical and acoustic instruments with powerful hands-on controls and a streamlined interface. Features the award-winning Nord C2D organ, seamless sound switching, and three independent sound sections. Available in three keyboard sizes: 61 semi-weighted waterfall, 73 semi-weighted, or 73 weighted (HP73).

specifications.Organ: Nord C2D with rotary speaker sim
specifications.Effects: Tremolo, Pan, Wah, Drive, Reverb, Delay

products.name: Nord Wave 2
products.description: A powerful 4-part performance synthesizer combining Virtual Analog synthesis, Samples, FM, and Wavetable synthesis with an intuitive workflow and hands-on controls. The Nord Wave 2 features a new panel design with dedicated OLED displays, streamlined layout, and our acclaimed performance synth features including Polyphonic Unison and built-in effects.

products.name: Nord Lead A1
products.description: Versatile and affordable analog modeling synthesizer with a unique oscillator concept and familiar Nord interface. The Lead A1 delivers rich, dynamic sounds with minimal programming. Features 4-part multitimbral capability, extensive modulation options, and the signature Nord sound quality in a compact, lightweight package perfect for any setup.

products.name: Nord Drum 3P
products.description: Six-channel digital percussion synthesizer in an ultra-portable format. The Nord Drum 3P provides hands-on control with dedicated knobs for every important parameter, making sound design immediate and intuitive. Includes an extensive factory library of acoustic and electronic drum sounds, with the ability to create everything from realistic acoustic kits to otherworldly electronic percussion.
